panels.description: What percentage of NTCP2/SSU2 handshakes succeed

targets.expr:
(sum(ntcp2_handshake_success_count) + (sum(ssu2_handshake_success_count) or vector(0))) /
((sum(ntcp2_handshake_failure_count) + sum(ntcp2_handshake_success_count)) or vector(0) + (sum(ssu2_handshake_success_count) + sum(ssu2_handshake_failure_count)) or vector(0)) * 100

panels.title: Handshake success rate
